dc:title: Fall Appeal - 1974
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Records the trials and financial costs of meeting city building codes on a new house for homeless women, and asks for prayers and continued financial support.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 544 1974-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
